hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came out from the privy and was presented to him. They (the people) asked: Should we bring you water for ablution? He replied: I have been commanded to perform ablution when I get up for prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي غَسْلِ الْيَدَيْنِ عِنْدَ الطَّعَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Washing the hands when wanting to eat
